description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 3/15/2006

Taylor explains to Brooke that she was only with Nick because he needed comfort and that Brooke should forgive him.  Brooke still thinks Taylor only wants Brooke to end up with Nick, so that Taylor can be with Ridge again.  Meanwhile, Stephanie is having difficulty coping with Felicia’s death.  Eric tells Jackie about Stephanie’s distance towards the family and how this troubles him.
